ygData.subject: Pricing
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I got into the game and made up a whole slew of the fishing poles.  It s a pity that they are trivial, but made em anyway. Made a set of the
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I got into the game and made up a whole slew of
the fishing poles. It's a pity that they are trivial, but made em anyway.
Made a set of the fireworks and was kinda disappointed in their graphic.
I'm sure that they'll patch em now that we know how to make them. Anywho, I
teleported back to South Karana's and began to auction my wares. I've
always charged 5X whatever something sells back to the vendors. I tried
selling my pole back to a vendor <who was apprehensive to me> and he would
give me 4 plat for it. So I charged 20plat. Think it costs roughly 5-6
plat to make depending on your faction. And take in consideration of
failures and 20pp seems fair to me, especially considering the travel
involved. Shall we be agreed on what to charge for this?

Also, one character came up to me and demanded the recipe.
Bah on him. Another came up begging. So I played the guessing game with
him till he got it right. :-) I will willingly share, but some people are
awfully demanding. Just so nice to finally be able to make something.
